#define N 1111111

int t[N * 4];
int a[N * 4];
int n;

void build(int v, int tl, int tr) {
	//hozir v-indexda protsess ketvotti
	if (tl == tr){
		t[v] = a[tl];
	}
	else {
		int tm = (tl + tr) / 2;
		build(v + v, tl, tm);
		build(v + v + 1, tm + 1, tr);
		t[v] = min (t[v + v], t[v + v + 1]);
	}
}



int getmin(int l, int r, int v = 1, int tl = 1, int tr = n) {
	if (l <= tl&&tr <= r) return t[v]; // agar node - l va r oralig'ida bo'lsa nodeni qiymatini qaytaradi
	if (l > tr || r < tl) return inf;
	int tm = (tl + tr) / 2;
	int s1 = getmin(l, r, v + v, tl, tm);
	int s2 = getmin(l, r, v + v + 1, tm + 1, tr);
	return min(s1,s2);
}


void solve()
{
	cin >> n;
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> a[i];
	build(1, 1, n);

	int l, r;
	while (cin >> l >> r)
	{
		cout << getmin(l, r) << endl;
	}


}
